Class Project

java.lang.Object
entity.Project
All Implemented Interfaces:
DateBound, OfficerAssignable, ProjectDetails
public class Project extends Object implements ProjectDetails, DateBound, OfficerAssignable
The Project class represents a Build-To-Order housing project with associated units, prices, application dates, and officer assignments. Interfaces implemented: - ProjectDetails - DateBound - OfficerAssignable This class is part of the Entity layer in the BTO Management System.

  • Constructor Details

    • Project

      public Project(String name, String neighborhood, int twoRoomUnits, int twoRoomPrice, int threeRoomUnits, int threeRoomPrice, LocalDate openingDate, LocalDate closingDate, String manager, int officerSlots)
      Constructs a Project with its core attributes and initializes the corresponding flat list.
      Parameters:
      name - name of the project
      neighborhood - location where the project is situated
      twoRoomUnits - number of available 2-Room flats
      twoRoomPrice - price of each 2-Room flat
      threeRoomUnits - number of available 3-Room flats
      threeRoomPrice - price of each 3-Room flat
      openingDate - start date for applications
      closingDate - end date for applications
      manager - manager responsible for this project
      officerSlots - number of officer slots available

  • Method Details

    • bookFlat

      public boolean bookFlat(String flatType, String applicantName, String officerName)
      Attempts to book a flat of the specified type for an applicant.
      Parameters:
      flatType - the type of flat requested (e.g., "2-Room", "3-Room")
      applicantName - the name of the applicant requesting the flat
      officerName - the name of the officer facilitating the booking
      Returns:
      true if a flat was successfully booked, false otherwise

    • toString

      public String toString()
      Returns a string representation of the project's core attributes.
      Overrides:
      toString in class Object
      Returns:
      formatted string including project name, neighborhood, unit counts, dates, and manager

    • isOpenForApplication

      public boolean isOpenForApplication()
      Checks if the project is currently open for application based on today's date.
      Specified by:
      isOpenForApplication in interface DateBound
      Returns:
      true if today is within the project's application period, false otherwise
